exit.desc: exits/quits the application cleanly (works for both Node dev and Electron builds)

getPanels.desc: returns object with active and other panels { active: {...}, other: {...} } each containing side, path, and selection (selection relative by default, absolute if param is false)

getActivePanel.desc: returns object with side, path, and selection for the active panel (selection relative by default, absolute if param is false)

getOtherPanel.desc: returns object with side, path, and selection for the other panel (selection relative by default, absolute if param is false)

getActivePanelSide.desc: returns 'left' or 'right' indicating which panel is currently active

getOtherPanelSide.desc: returns 'left' or 'right' indicating which panel is currently other/inactive

setActivePanelSide.desc: sets which panel should be active ('left' or 'right', defaults to 'left')

toggleActivePanelSide.desc: toggles the active panel between left and right

swapPanels.desc: swaps the paths of the left and right panels

refreshActivePanel.desc: refreshes the file list of the active panel

refreshOtherPanel.desc: refreshes the file list of the other panel

refreshBothPanels.desc: refreshes the file list of both panels

setActivePanelPath.desc: sets the path of the active panel (async, returns {success, error?})

setOtherPanelPath.desc: sets the path of the other panel (async, returns {success, error?})

setActivePanelSelection.desc: sets the selection for the active panel (returns {selected, notFound})

setOtherPanelSelection.desc: sets the selection for the other panel (returns {selected, notFound})

resetActivePanelSelection.desc: clears the selection for the active panel (unselects all items)

resetOtherPanelSelection.desc: clears the selection for the other panel (unselects all items)

resetBothPanelsSelections.desc: clears the selection for both panels (unselects all items in both panels)

invertActivePanelSelection.desc: inverts the selection for the active panel (selects unselected, unselects selected)

invertOtherPanelSelection.desc: inverts the selection for the other panel (selects unselected, unselects selected)

setActivePanelQuickSelect.desc: performs quick select on active panel using a pattern (returns count of items selected)

setOtherPanelQuickSelect.desc: performs quick select on other panel using a pattern (returns count of items selected)

setActivePanelQuickUnselect.desc: performs quick unselect on active panel using a pattern (returns count of items unselected)

setOtherPanelQuickUnselect.desc: performs quick unselect on other panel using a pattern (returns count of items unselected)

setActivePanelQuickFilter.desc: sets a filter pattern for the active panel to show only matching items (returns count of matching items)

setOtherPanelQuickFilter.desc: sets a filter pattern for the other panel to show only matching items (returns count of matching items)

setActivePanelQuickFilterFiles.desc: filters the active panel to show only files (returns count of files)

setOtherPanelQuickFilterFiles.desc: filters the other panel to show only files (returns count of files)

setActivePanelQuickFilterFolders.desc: filters the active panel to show only folders (returns count of folders)

setOtherPanelQuickFilterFolders.desc: filters the other panel to show only folders (returns count of folders)

setActivePanelQuickFilterZipFiles.desc: filters the active panel to show only zip/archive files (returns count of zip files)

setOtherPanelQuickFilterZipFiles.desc: filters the other panel to show only zip/archive files (returns count of zip files)

resetActivePanelQuickFilter.desc: clears the filter for the active panel (shows all items, returns count of items)

resetOtherPanelQuickFilter.desc: clears the filter for the other panel (shows all items, returns count of items)

resetBothPanelQuickFilter.desc: clears the filter for both panels (shows all items, returns combined count of items)

selectActivePanelFiles.desc: selects only files (non-folder, non-parent items) in the active panel (returns count of files selected)

selectOtherPanelFiles.desc: selects only files (non-folder, non-parent items) in the other panel (returns count of files selected)

selectActivePanelFolders.desc: selects only folders in the active panel (returns count of folders selected)

selectOtherPanelFolders.desc: selects only folders in the other panel (returns count of folders selected)

selectActivePanelZipFiles.desc: selects only zip/archive files in the active panel (returns count of zip files selected)

selectOtherPanelZipFiles.desc: selects only zip/archive files in the other panel (returns count of zip files selected)

unselectActivePanelFiles.desc: unselects only files in the active panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

unselectOtherPanelFiles.desc: unselects only files in the other panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

unselectActivePanelFolders.desc: unselects only folders in the active panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

unselectOtherPanelFolders.desc: unselects only folders in the other panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

unselectActivePanelZipFiles.desc: unselects only zip/archive files in the active panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

unselectOtherPanelZipFiles.desc: unselects only zip/archive files in the other panel (returns count of items remaining in selection)

getActivePanelPath.desc: returns the absolute path of the currently active panel

getOtherPanelPath.desc: returns the absolute path of the currently other panel

getActivePanelSelection.desc: returns array of paths for selected items in the active panel (relative by default, absolute if param is false)

getOtherPanelSelection.desc: returns array of paths for selected items in the other panel (relative by default, absolute if param is false)
